title: WTB Fred Abbott t206 with rare back
author: where the gold at?

posts.post_title: WTB Fred Abbott t206 with rare back
posts.post_content: as my title states im looking to purchase a Fred Abbott with a rare back id prefer it to be in a Sgc holder but ill consider raw or Psa. Please let me know. im trying to knock out my missing cards from my set Alphabetically.
